# Mock DNS responses for testing
# Format: domain=ip1,ip2,ip3

registry.npmjs.org=104.16.16.35,104.16.17.35,104.16.18.35
api.anthropic.com=54.230.156.89,54.230.156.12
sentry.io=35.186.224.25
statsig.anthropic.com=52.85.151.22
statsig.com=13.225.78.64,13.225.78.89

# Invalid responses for testing error handling
invalid.domain=
malformed.domain=not-an-ip-address
timeout.domain=TIMEOUT
